overview: Rudy just turned 18. He was sick of his job at McDonald's and now that he was an adult, he wanted to do something new and exciting. Now let's see: What kind of work does every young fag dream about? Working for a large corporation and someday becoming the CEO? Nah. Joining the military and serving his country? Wrong again. Hanging his skull upside-down and getting hammered by a huge cock for all of the world to watch? Absolutely!
title: Gag the Fag 4
